data.message: I do not want the messaging app I do not want to see an advertisement for the messaging at every 2 seconds I can't even see my messages right now unless I download the app it's starting to upset me if I want the app ill download it

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that, Jamie. If there's anything we can do to make your Messenger experience more enjoyable, please let us know: http://on.fb.me/1DS4rkt. -Sarah
I don't think we have a choice in the matter. 😳

There is nothin you can do to "make the messenger experience more enjoyable." We downloaded your FB app,  we frequently use your FB app, no one wants to have to open two different apps (or sacrifice the phone memory space) just to open messages that were working perfectly well before.
don't even have a phone to use it on !!
You can pay for facebook or let the advertising company's pay instead of you.
Don't want another app taking up my useage space! Will not be installing Messinger and have notified all my "friends".
Not to mention the extra battery life the app will suck from your phone. The Facebook app is already a battery hog just by itself!
I just use internet on phone but it is a hassle.  I refuse to fl messanger app. Sux how fb app constantly reopens even if u force close
